Articles.Content:
Hey guys... I'll just leave this here.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8uhWxZDxa7Q

Basically made using Arma: Cold War assault. Final version will be made using Arma II so better graphics, better movements, and better sounds! Thanks to Spooky_Zalost for the voice acting!

Could use more voice actors for the final if anyone would be interested...

I like it. A lot.

My only gripe is that it feels a tad.. cheesy. The delivery was okay (Turn up the volume, since I couldn't hear him to save my life), but the writing felt like some old action movie you'd expect to see and write off but go to see in theaters anyways.

Can't say it's horrible though, it's certainly something I want to see. And soon.

Other than that it's amazing. I play a lot of Arma (2 without any DLCs, moving onto 3 after an editor glitch made the Arma 2 editor a pain to work with) so I can definitely appreciate the work gone into making this.
